summary.description: > MEDIUM CONFIDENCE! | An integrative approach uncovers genes with perturbed interactions in cancers | Rapidly uncover significantly somatically mutated protein functional regions | The goal of our analytical PertInInt method is to rapidly uncover proteins with significant enrichments of somatic Perturbations In Interaction and other functional sites. If you use data or scripts from this repository, please cite:
summary.name: PertInInt
